master.name: master
master.description: Main task list for Troodie app development - Fresh UI/UX and Feature Improvements

tasks.title: Add User Images to Restaurant Photos Tab When Posting
tasks.description: When a user makes a post with a restaurant attached, automatically add the user's image within the photos tab of that restaurant to build user-generated content gallery.
tasks.details:
- Implement automatic photo addition when user creates post with restaurant
- Add photos to restaurant's Photos tab
- Ensure proper attribution to the posting user
- Handle image resizing and quality optimization
- Implement privacy settings for photo visibility
tasks.testStrategy: Test posting with restaurant attachment, verify photo appears in restaurant's Photos tab with proper attribution
acceptanceCriteria: User posts with restaurant show images in restaurant Photos tab
Images are properly attributed to the posting user
Privacy settings are respected
Image quality is optimized for mobile viewing

tasks.title: Implement Save to Board Toast with Homescreen Pattern
tasks.description: When a user saves a restaurant from the detail page, show a toast notification with the option to add to a different board, using the same pattern as the homescreen.
tasks.details:
- Create toast notification component for save actions
- Implement board selection modal using homescreen pattern
- Add 'Add to Board' action in toast
- Handle Quick Saves as default with option to change
- Ensure consistent UX across the app
tasks.testStrategy: Test saving restaurant, verify toast appears with board selection option matching homescreen pattern
acceptanceCriteria: Toast notification appears when saving restaurant
Board selection follows homescreen pattern
Default save to Quick Saves works
User can select different board from toast
UI is consistent with existing patterns

tasks.title: Auto-Set Restaurant Cover Photo from User Posts
tasks.description: Restaurant detail pages should never have empty cover photos. When a user posts with a photo attached, that photo should become the cover image if none exists or only a default is used.
tasks.details:
- Implement automatic cover photo selection from user posts
- Prioritize high-quality user-generated images
- Fall back to default images when no user content exists
- Handle multiple candidate images with smart selection
- Ensure proper image sizing and cropping
tasks.testStrategy: Test restaurant with no cover photo, post image, verify it becomes cover photo
acceptanceCriteria: Restaurants never show empty cover photos
User post images become cover photos when appropriate
Image quality and sizing is optimized
Smart selection prioritizes best images
Fallback to defaults works properly

tasks.title: Remove Google Reference from Add Restaurant Modal
tasks.description: Update the Add New Restaurant modal to remove Google-specific references and make the search more generic.
tasks.details:
- Change placeholder text from 'Search for restaurant on Google...' to 'Search for restaurant...'
- Remove any Google branding or references
- Update help text to be platform-agnostic
- Ensure search functionality remains intact
- Update any related documentation
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Add New Restaurant modal shows generic search text without Google references
acceptanceCriteria: No Google references in placeholder text
Search functionality works as before
UI is consistent with app branding
Help text is platform-agnostic

tasks.title: Uppercase T in Troodie Brand Name
tasks.description: Update the home screen header to capitalize the T in 'troodie' to make it 'Troodie' for better brand consistency.
tasks.details:
- Update home screen header text
- Ensure consistent capitalization across the app
- Check other instances of the brand name
- Update any related assets or constants
- Maintain consistent typography
tasks.testStrategy: Verify home screen shows 'Troodie' with capital T
acceptanceCriteria: Home screen header shows 'Troodie' with capital T
Brand name is consistent across app
Typography follows design guidelines

tasks.title: Improve Find Friends Workflow
tasks.description: Enhance the 'find friends' workflow in the Add Content screen to make it easier and more intuitive for users to discover and connect with others.
tasks.details:
- Redesign find friends interface for better UX
- Add search functionality for finding users
- Implement friend suggestions based on interests/location
- Improve visual design and information architecture
- Add onboarding hints and guidance
tasks.testStrategy: Test friend discovery flow, verify improved usability and clear user paths
acceptanceCriteria: Find friends interface is intuitive and easy to use
Search functionality works effectively
Friend suggestions are relevant and helpful
Visual design is improved and consistent
Onboarding guidance helps new users

tasks.title: Implement Navigation Links in Post Detail Screen
tasks.description: Add clickable navigation to usernames and restaurants in the post detail screen, allowing users to navigate to profile and restaurant pages respectively.
tasks.details:
- Make usernames clickable to navigate to profile pages
- Make restaurant names/images clickable to navigate to restaurant pages
- Implement proper touch targets and visual feedback
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Handle navigation state management
tasks.testStrategy: Test clicking usernames and restaurants in post detail, verify proper navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Usernames are clickable and navigate to profile pages
Restaurant names/images navigate to restaurant pages
Touch targets are appropriately sized
Visual feedback indicates clickable elements
Navigation works smoothly without issues

tasks.title: Add Community Tab to User Profile Page
tasks.description: Add a community tab to user profile pages showing communities they're part of, communities they've created, and providing easy navigation to community features.
tasks.details:
- Add Communities tab to profile page layout
- Display user's joined communities
- Show communities created by the user
- Implement community creation shortcuts
- Add community activity indicators
- Ensure proper permissions and privacy
tasks.testStrategy: Test community tab shows correct communities, creation options work properly
acceptanceCriteria: Community tab appears on user profile pages
Shows joined and created communities correctly
Community creation shortcuts work
Privacy settings are respected
Navigation to communities is smooth

tasks.title: Add Communities to Explore Page Creatively
tasks.description: Enhance the explore page by creatively integrating communities, including featured communities, trending communities, or personalized recommendations.
tasks.details:
- Design creative community discovery section
- Implement featured communities showcase
- Add trending communities based on activity
- Create personalized community recommendations
- Integrate with existing explore page layout
- Add community preview cards with key info
tasks.testStrategy: Test explore page shows relevant communities, recommendations work properly
acceptanceCriteria: Communities are creatively integrated into explore page
Featured communities are prominently displayed
Trending communities show based on real activity
Personalized recommendations are relevant
Community preview cards provide useful information

tasks.title: Move Tags Within Restaurant Card in What's Hot Section
tasks.description: Redesign the 'what's hot right now' section on the home screen to place tags within the restaurant card box instead of outside it for better visual hierarchy.
tasks.details:
- Redesign restaurant cards in 'what's hot' section
- Move tags inside card boundaries
- Improve information hierarchy and visual design
- Ensure tags don't interfere with other card elements
- Maintain readability and accessibility
- Update card layout to accommodate tags
tasks.testStrategy: Verify tags appear within restaurant cards in what's hot section with good visual hierarchy
acceptanceCriteria: Tags are positioned within restaurant card boundaries
Visual hierarchy is improved and clear
Tags don't interfere with other card elements
Card layout accommodates tags properly
Design is consistent with app aesthetics
